alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Seminole, northwestern Brevard and southeastern Volusia Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maytown, or 7 miles northeast of Geneva, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Geneva, Maytown, Lake Harney, Farmton and Mullet Lake Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter immediately inside a building or hard-topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Seminole
